sentences:
Peter Iwers ( born on 15 May 1975 ) is the former bass player of the Swedish band In Flames .
He played with In Flames from their 1999 album Colony , up until their 2016 album Battles , originally replacing Johan Larsson who departed after 1997 's Whoracle .
He was also the bassist for the band Cyhra with former In Flames bandmate Jesper Strömblad from 2017 to 2018 .
His bass playing style has been influenced by Toto bassist Mike Porcaro , as well as Geddy Lee from Rush and John Myung of Dream Theater fame .
He has two daughters and one son .
His brother Anders is also a bass player , who plays for Tiamat , Avatarium ( 2014- ) & Dark Tranquillity ( 2015- ) .
He now brews beer at his brewery outside Gothenburg , Odd Island Brewing , together with his co - owner Daniel Svensson .
Before he joined in Flames , Iwers played in a band called Chameleon .
